question: Which of the following is NOT true: W) an irrational number is one that cannot be expressed as the ratio of integers X) fractions equal to 1 are called mixed fractions Y) the numerator is less than the denominator in a proper fraction Z) a composite number is a positive integer greater than 1 that is not prime
answer: X) FRACTIONS EQUAL TO 1 ARE CALLED MIXED FRACTIONS
